name: Albania
description: Spring brings flowers and warmer weather to the Balkans, but still some unpredictable rainfall.

name: Armenia
description: It's starting to get a little less cold, but don't expect anything above 10¬∞C.

name: Austria
description: The sun is thawing the public squares. Hiking and cycling are becoming possible from late March, but many sights outside Vienna are still dormant.

name: Azerbaijan
description: It's starting to get a little less cold, but don't expect anything above 10¬∞C except perhaps on the coast. Across Azerbaijan shops sell emerald-green fresh wheatgrass (samani) as signs of the coming spring.

name: Bosnia & Herzegovina
description: Spring brings flowers and warmer weather to the Balkans, but still some unpredictable rainfall.

name: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
Croatia
description: Days start to get longer and temperatures begin to rise, especially at the seaside. As winter ice melts, it's a great time to catch the waterfalls in Plitvice and Krka. Most action is still indoors.

name: Cyprus
description: Enjoy wildflowers, particularly orchids, with more than 32 endemic varieties. Birdwatching, hiking and the occasional sunbed on the sand make this a good month for a spring break.

name: Czech Republic
description: The first buds of spring begin to green the countryside, and the Easter holidays bring Easter markets, hand-painted Easter eggs, and the first tourist influx of the year.

name: Estonia
description: Locals pull aside the curtains to check the weather outside... yup, it's still winter out there. The main causes for celebration are the Easter holidays, although they sometimes slip into April.

name: Finland
description: Hours of light dramatically increase and temperatures begin to rise, making March an excellent time to take advantage of the hefty snow cover and indulge in some winter activities.

name: France
description: The ski season stays busy thanks to ongoing school holidays (until mid-March) and warmer temperatures. Down south, spring ushers in the bullfighting season and P√¢ques (Easter).

name: Georgia
description: It's starting to get a little less cold, but don't expect anything above 10¬∞C except perhaps on the coast.

name: Germany
description: Days start getting longer and the first inkling of spring is in the air. Fresh herring hits the menus, especially along the coastal regions, and dishes prepared with B√§rlauch (wild garlic) are all the rage.

name: Greece
description: The islands are sleepy but the weather is warming up, making March a relaxed time to visit. Although the national calendar is quiet, there are countless religious festivals celebrated with great gusto in towns.

name: Hungary
description: This is an excellent month to visit Hungary. Women have put their furs back in the closet, and it's the start of the concert and theatre season in many cities.

name: Iceland
description: Winter is officially over in other parts of the world, but it's not time to start celebrating here. The country wakes from its slumber; winter activities such as skiing are popular as daylight hours increase.

name: Ireland
description: Spring is in the air, and the whole country is getting ready for arguably the world's most famous parade. Dublin's is the biggest, but every town in Ireland holds one.

name: Italy
description: The weather in March is capricious: sunny, rainy and windy all at once. The official start of spring is 21 March, but the holiday season starts at Easter.

name: Kosovo
description: Spring brings flowers and warmer weather to the Balkans, but still some unpredictable rainfall.

name: Latvia
description: Locals pull aside the curtains to check the weather outside... yup, it's still winter out there. The main causes for celebration are the Easter holidays, although they sometimes slip into April.

name: Lithuania
description: Locals pull aside the curtains to check the weather outside... yup, it's still winter out there. The main causes for celebration are the Easter holidays, although they sometimes slip into April.

name: Macedonia
description: Spring brings flowers and warmer weather to the Balkans, but still some unpredictable rainfall.

name: Montenegro
description: Spring brings flowers and warmer weather to the Balkans, but still some unpredictable rainfall.

name: Netherlands
description: If the weather complies, you can get a jump-start on bulbfield viewing in March, and since the season is still off-peak, you won't have to fight the crowds to enjoy them.

name: Norway
description: Days are lengthening as Norway awakes from its slumber with a full program of festivals (celebrating either winter's end or traditional Norwegian activities). It's one of the most popular months for visiting Svalbard.

name: Romania
description: March starts out festive, with the annual M√§rtisor (1 March) holiday to mark the start of spring, but the rest of the month is normally cold, dark and wet.

name: Serbia
description: Spring brings flowers and warmer weather to the Balkans, but still some unpredictable rainfall.

name: Slovenia
description: Still plenty of good skiing in the higher elevations; elsewhere the country is relatively quiet.

name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Spain
description: With the arrival of spring, Spain shakes off its winter blues (such as they are), the weather starts to warm up ever so slightly and Spaniards start dreaming of a summer by the beach

name: Sweden
description: The winter season begins to wind down in the southern half of the country, though winter sports are still going strong in Norrland.

name: Switzerland
description: The tail end of the ski season stays busy thanks to temperatures that no longer turn lips blue and, depending on the year, Easter holidays.

name: Turkey
description: As in the preceding months, you might have sights to yourself outside the country's top destinations, and you can get discounts at accommodation options that are open.

name: Ukraine
description: There's usually little sign of spring in March, with temperatures hovering around zero and occasional snow falls. The Carpathian skiing season begins to wind up mid-month.

name: United Kingdom
description: Spring finally arrives. There's a hint of better weather, and some classic sporting fixtures grace the calendar. Many locals stay hunkered down at home, though, so hotels offer special rates.
